title: S12 Ep65: Houdini's Final Incredible Secret
itunes:title: Houdini's Final Incredible Secret
description:
What could Houdini have done to convince the creator of Sherlock Holmes, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle that he was more that an illusionist, that he was capable of TRUE supernatural powers? Bob Loomis has spent 20 years investigating and shares his insights with us.

Bob Loomis: https://www.facebook.com/HoudinisSecret
